public class Fireball
extends SmoothMover

Defines the motion of the cannonball as it is launched from either player1 or player 2

Method Detail

act

public void act()
Checks for collision midair. If there is a collision midair, the object is removed. if there is no collision midair, then cannonball keeps motion until it dectects one.
